lead_paragraph: SMITH--Philip B. The partners of iQ Venture Advisors mourn the death of Phil Smith, our founder, leader, and mentor. We express our heartfelt condolences to his wife Linda and to the Smith family. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  SMITH, PHILIP B

snippet: SMITH--Philip B. The partners of iQ Venture Advisors mourn the death of Phil Smith, our founder, leader, and mentor. We express our heartfelt condolences to his wife Linda and to the Smith family. 1/3
